Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel & Spa Dynastic in Benidorm (Rincon de Loix), you'll be minutes from Casino Mediterraneo Benidorm and close to Benidorm Palace. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Cala del Tio Ximo Beach and Aqualandia.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 206 guestrooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool, an indoor pool, and a spa tub. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), supervised childcare/activities, and a hair salon.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. For a surcharge, guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle (available 24 hours) and a train station pick-up service.


Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is noon
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Hotel & Spa Dynastic in Benidorm (Rincon de Loix), you'll be minutes from Casino Mediterraneo Benidorm and close to Benidorm Palace. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Cala del Tio Ximo Beach and Aqualandia.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Casino Mediterraneo Benidorm - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Benidorm Palace - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Cala del Tio Ximo Beach - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Aqualandia - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Mundomar - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Cavall Peak and Morales Tower - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Benidorm City Hall - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Mediterranean Balcony - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Placa del Castell - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Malpas Beach - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Estadio Municipal Guillermo Amor - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Bodega Enrique Mendoza - 3.5 km / 2.1 mi
Club de Golf Las Rejas - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Benidorm Island - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Villaitana Golf Course - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel & Spa Dynastic is Alicante (ALC-Alicante Intl.) - 48.2 km / 30 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
